codeText: @Test_	public void activateListenerWithoutExistingRequestAttributes() throws Exception {_		BDDMockito.<Class<?>> given(testContext.getTestClass()).willReturn(NoAtWebAppConfigWebTestCase.class)__		given(testContext.getAttribute(ServletTestExecutionListener.ACTIVATE_LISTENER)).willReturn(true)___		RequestContextHolder.resetRequestAttributes()__		listener.beforeTestClass(testContext)__		assertRequestAttributesDoNotExist()___		assertWebAppConfigTestCase()__	}
